Pet Mint is an app for helping people to adopt pets such as dogs, cats, birds or any other pets as per their requirement. This app promotes adopting pets instead of buying them from any pet shop with its moto as "Adopt, don't shop".
Note: We strictly prohibit anyone from selling pets on this platform. This app is strictly for voluntarily adoption of pets and not selling of any kind.
This app is published under the company name Leaf Code and thus all the rights to it belongs to the Leaf Code only. Any kind of unfair use of its content will not be appreciated.
Contact Us Whatsapp : +91 8569822464 Email : leafcodeandev@gmail.com
Delete
Note This app is currently in Beta version v1.0.2 further updates will be rolled out soon meanwhile, you can report any errors you spot in the Help & Support section
